title: HANDOFF: Audio Reactivity Complete - Next: Layout Polish (Grid)
description: Audio Reactivity (FFT) complete. AudioAnalyzer with compute_spectrum(), get_energy(), bass(), mids(), highs(). Schema: AudioTrack, AudioReactiveBinding. Rhai API working. Next blocker for V1: Layout Polish (Grid) - gr-jimjmf.

title: V1 Frontend (Raycast for Video)
description: Dioxus Desktop launcher: Raycast for Video. Lightweight entry (<50MB RAM), dynamic engine loading. Apps: Recorder (light), Editor (heavy). Extensible platform for future plugins. BLOCKED BY: V1 SDK Layer.

title: Elastic Easings
description: Implement real BackOut, ElasticOut, and BounceOut easings. Current BounceOut is faked as EaseOut. Required for premium pop-in animations.

title: Hardware Acceleration (GPU + NVENC)
description: Enable GPU-accelerated rendering and hardware video encoding for V1. Scope: 1) Stabilize Vulkan/Metal Skia backends for GPU rasterization. 2) Enable NVENC/VideoToolbox in video-rs for faster MP4 export. Part of V1 Core Polish milestone.

title: Pipeline: Handle All NodeKinds
description: Pipeline currently only handles Box, Text, Image. Add: VideoNode, VectorNode, LottieNode, EffectNode, CompositionNode. Sync with schema additions.

title: Kinetic Typography
description: Custom text renderer that uses SkParagraph for layout but extracts glyph positions for per-letter animation. Enables Karaoke effects and wavy text. THE #1 BLOCKER for premium motion.

title: Audio Reactivity (FFT)
description: Implement FFT helper (director.audio.get_spectrum()) for beat-reactive visuals. Staple of faceless content - elements pulse to the beat.

title: Schema: Add Audio Tracks
description: Add audio track schema to Scene. Include path, start_time, volume, fade_in/out.

title: Schema: Add VectorNode and LottieNode
description: Add SVG (VectorNode) and Lottie animation node types to NodeKind enum. Include speed, loop for Lottie.

title: Schema: Add CompositionNode (Nested Timelines)
description: Add CompositionNode to schema NodeKind for nested timeline support. Requires designing a schema structure for referencing/embedding sub-compositions. Deferred from gr-sdsl7s to keep initial parity work focused.

title: Schema: Expand StyleMap
description: Add missing style properties: border_width, border_color, shadow_*, overflow, gap, flex_wrap, per-side padding/margin.

title: Schema: Add Transitions
description: Add Transition schema for scene-to-scene transitions. Types: fade, slide_left/right, wipe_left/right, circle_open. Include duration and easing.

title: Implement Benchmark Suite
description: Set up Criterion.rs benchmarks for: render_empty_frame, render_text, render_box_100, layout_100_nodes, animation_update. Document baseline numbers. See docs/issues/004 for original spec.

title: HANDOFF: Schema/Pipeline Parity Complete
description:
## Summary
Schema and Pipeline now at feature parity with director-core.

## Completed
- NodeKind expanded (4 → 7): Vector, Lottie, Effect added
- EffectConfig enum for blur/drop_shadow
- StyleMap: opacity, absolute positioning (top/left/right/bottom)
- TextAnimator for kinetic typography (per-glyph animations)
- All 13 easing types supported (elastic, bounce, back, etc.)

## Closed Issues
- gr-sdsl7s (Schema/Pipeline Parity)
- gr-c24050 (VectorNode and LottieNode)  
- gr-qyasrz (Absolute Positioning)
- gr-7z89ku (Handle All NodeKinds)

## Deferred
- gr-ckfao3 (CompositionNode - needs nested timeline schema)

## V1 Core Polish Status
✅ Kinetic Typography - DONE
✅ Elastic Easings - DONE
❌ Audio Reactivity (gr-aomqi5) - NEXT
❌ Cinematic Shaders (gr-r36o5i)
❌ Layout Polish/Grid (gr-jimjmf)

## NEXT AGENT PROMPT
Run gr pulse then work on Audio Reactivity (gr-aomqi5).

Context: Schema/Pipeline Parity complete. Kinetic Typography and Elastic Easings done. Still blocking V1 Core Polish: Audio Reactivity, Cinematic Shaders, Layout Polish. SDK layer (gr-jps172) is BLOCKED until Core Polish is complete.

Task: Implement Audio Reactivity (FFT) - gr-aomqi5. This enables animations to react to audio frequencies.

Steps:
1. gr inspect gr-aomqi5
2. Check existing audio.rs in director-core
3. Add FFT analysis (consider rustfft crate)
4. Expose frequency bands to animation system
5. Add scripting bindings for Rhai

title: Code Audit: Engine Capabilities (Jan 2026)
description:
# Director Engine: Code-Based Capabilities Audit

**Date**: 2026-01-01
**Source of Truth**: Codebase analysis (NOT docs/issues)

---

## Node Types (8)
- BoxNode: Container, flexbox, bg_color, border, shadow, overflow, border_radius
- TextNode: SkParagraph text, multi-span, per-glyph animators
- ImageNode: Static images, object_fit (cover/contain/fill)
- VideoNode: Video playback, object_fit, audio extraction
- VectorNode: SVG rendering
- LottieNode: Lottie JSON animations, speed, looping
- EffectNode: Visual effects wrapper (applies to children)
- CompositionNode: Nested timeline with internal Director

## Animation System
- **13 Easings**: Linear, EaseIn/Out/InOut, BounceIn/Out/InOut, ElasticIn/Out/InOut, BackIn/Out/InOut
- **Keyframe**: Animated<T> with add_keyframe(), add_segment()
- **Spring**: SpringConfig { stiffness, damping, mass, initial_velocity }
- **Text Animators**: per-glyph opacity, offset_y, offset_x, scale, rotation

## Effects (5)
- Blur (sigma)
- DropShadow (blur, offset_x, offset_y, color)
- ColorMatrix (4x5 matrix, Grayscale/Sepia presets)
- DirectionalBlur (strength, angle, samples)
- FilmGrain (intensity, size)

## Transitions (6)
Fade, SlideLeft, SlideRight, WipeLeft, WipeRight, CircleOpen

## Audio
- AudioMixer: Multi-track mixing, stereo output
- AudioAnalyzer: FFT-based spectrum, bass/mids/highs bands
- Audio Reactivity: bind_audio -> map bands to properties

## Layout
- Taffy integration (CSS Flexbox + Grid)
- Supports: flex_direction, justify_content, align_items, flex_wrap, gap
- Grid: grid_template_columns/rows, grid_row, grid_column
- Positioning: absolute/relative, insets

## Rhai API (30+ functions)
- Lifecycle: new_director, add_scene, rand_float
- Nodes: add_box, add_text, add_image, add_video, add_svg, add_lottie, add_composition
- Animation: animate, path_animate, add_text_animator
- Effects: apply_effect (blur, grayscale, sepia, directional_blur, grain, shader)
- Audio: add_audio, bass, mids, highs, bind_audio
- Properties: set_style, set_pivot, set_z_index, set_mask, set_blend_mode

## Export
- FFmpeg encoding via video-rs
- Configurable resolution, FPS
- Audio muxing from AudioMixer

See: docs/engine_audit_2026_01.md

title: Layout Polish (Grid)
description: Enable Taffy Grid support for complex Bento layouts. Ensure position:absolute supports fit-to-parent (top/bottom/left/right=0).

title: V1 SDK Layer
description: High-level facade over director-core. Unifies director-core + director-schema + director-pipeline. 3-layer abstraction: L1 Macros, L2 Smart Components, L3 Recipes. Capability-aware, multi-frontend compatible. BLOCKED BY: V1 Core Polish.

title: V1 Core Polish
description: Enable premium, kinetic motion graphics before building SDK or Frontend. Blockers: Kinetic Typography, Elastic Easings, Audio Reactivity, Cinematic Shaders, Layout Polish.

title: Fix Lottie Test/Bench Compilation
description: Tests and benchmarks in lottie-core and lottie-skia fail to compile due to API drift. ERRORS: animator_bench.rs (missing field x, wrong arg count), test_dash.rs (LottieJson vs Arc<LottieAsset>), compositing.rs (same type mismatch), context_test.rs (missing load_bytes impl). Also update deprecated skia Surface API. Run: cargo check --all-targets

title: HANDOFF: Kinetic Typography Complete - Next Priority Issues
description:
## Session Summary

Kinetic Typography (gr-9t19gh) is COMPLETE and merged.

### What Was Built
- **text_animator.rs** - TextAnimator with stagger, TextAnimProperty (Opacity, OffsetX/Y, Scale, Rotation)
- **Glyph extraction** - get_glyph_rects() using SkParagraph get_rects_for_range
- **Per-glyph rendering** - render_per_glyph() with canvas transforms
- **Rhai API** - add_animator(start_idx, end_idx, property, start, end, dur, ease)
- **Demo** - examples/features/kinetic_text.rhai showcasing all 5 effects

### Tests Passed
- test_stagger_timing
- test_total_duration
- Visual verification via kinetic_demo_full.mp4

### Next Priority Issues (Track A)
1. gr-52nivy - Elastic Easings (spring physics)
2. gr-aomqi5 - Audio Reactivity

### Remaining Issues
- gr-sdsl7s - Schema/Pipeline Parity (epic)
- gr-qyasrz - Schema: Add Absolute Positioning
- gr-7z89ku - Pipeline: Handle All NodeKinds

Run gr pulse to see current state.

title: Schema: Add Absolute Positioning
description: Add position, inset (top/left/right/bottom), z_index to StyleMap. Critical for any layout complexity.

title: Cinematic Shaders
description: Add Directional Blur and Noise/Grain shaders to EffectNode. Fast motion looks strobing without motion blur.

title: Schema/Pipeline Parity
description: Bring director-schema and director-pipeline to feature parity with director-core. L0 foundation work. BLOCKS: V1 SDK Layer (SDK needs complete L0 to build on). See gap analysis: missing VideoNode in pipeline, absolute positioning, effects, transitions, audio, SVG, Lottie.

title: Schema: Add Effects System
description: Add EffectNode schema with blur, grayscale, sepia, invert, custom_shader, blend_mode. Replicate EffectType enum from Core.

title: Schema: Add SpringConfig
description: Add spring physics animation support. SpringConfig struct with stiffness, damping, mass, velocity. Alternative to easing-based animation.

title: Expand Visual Regression Test Coverage
description: Add more visual tests covering: text nodes, image nodes, animation states, effects (blur/shadows). Infrastructure is in place. Target: 20+ tests covering core functionality. See docs/issues/001 for original spec.

title: HANDOFF: Schema/Pipeline Parity Complete
description:
## Summary
Schema and Pipeline now at feature parity with director-core.

## Completed
1. **Schema NodeKind** expanded (4 → 7 types):
   - Added: Vector (SVG), Lottie (with speed/loop), Effect (blur/drop_shadow)
   - Added object_fit to Image/Video

2. **EffectConfig** enum added for effect configuration

3. **StyleMap** expanded:
   - opacity: f32
   - position: 'relative' | 'absolute'
   - top/left/right/bottom insets

4. **TextAnimator** struct added for kinetic typography:
   - Per-glyph animations (start_idx, end_idx, property, values, duration, easing)
   - All 13 easing types supported (including elastic, bounce, back)

5. **Pipeline** handles all node types:
   - VideoNode, VectorNode, LottieNode, EffectNode
   - Absolute positioning via apply_style_map
   - Text animators applied during build

## Closed Issues
- gr-sdsl7s (Schema/Pipeline Parity)
- gr-c24050 (VectorNode and LottieNode)
- gr-qyasrz (Absolute Positioning)
- gr-7z89ku (Handle All NodeKinds)

## Created Issues
- gr-ckfao3 (CompositionNode - deferred)

## Files Modified
- crates/director-schema/src/lib.rs
- crates/director-pipeline/src/lib.rs

## Next Priority
- V1 SDK Layer (gr-jps172) - now unblocked
- Audio Reactivity (gr-aomqi5)
- Cinematic Shaders (gr-r36o5i)

title: Complete CI/CD Pipeline
description: Add comprehensive CI workflow beyond visual regression. CURRENT: Only visual_regression.yml runs. NEEDED: cargo check, cargo fmt --check, cargo clippy, cargo test (unit tests), multi-platform matrix (Linux/Windows/macOS), dependency caching. Add status badge to README.
